languages.text: "Я сохранил{mf||а} жизнь Маражаю не для того, чтобы вы устроили самосуд! Убрать оружие, всем!"
"I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"
languages.original_text: "Я сохранил{mf||а} жизнь Маражаю не для того, чтобы вы устроили самосуд! Убрать оружие, всем!"

traits.locale_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"
"I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"
"I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"
"I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

languages.text: “我救下玛拉斋这条命，可不是为了让你们动用私刑！全都给我把武器收起来！”
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: “我救下玛拉斋这条命，可不是为了让你们动用私刑！全都给我把武器收起来！”

languages.text: «¡No le he salvado la vida a Marazhai para que pudierais tomaros la justicia por vuestra mano! ¡Deponed todos las armas ahora mismo!».
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No le he salvado la vida a Marazhai para que pudierais tomaros la justicia por vuestra mano! ¡Deponed todos las armas ahora mismo!».

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas sauvé la vie de Marazhai pour que vous vous débarrassiez de lui ainsi. Rengainez vos armes immédiatement, tous autant que vous êtes ! »
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas sauvé la vie de Marazhai pour que vous vous débarrassiez de lui ainsi. Rengainez vos armes immédiatement, tous autant que vous êtes ! »

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht Marazhais Leben gerettet, damit ihr die Angelegenheit selbst in die Hand nehmt! Legt eure Waffen nieder, alle!"
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht Marazhais Leben gerettet, damit ihr die Angelegenheit selbst in die Hand nehmt! Legt eure Waffen nieder, alle!"

languages.text: 「私がマラズハイの命を救ったのは、お前たちの手で殺させるためではない！全員、武器を置け！」
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: 「私がマラズハイの命を救ったのは、お前たちの手で殺させるためではない！全員、武器を置け！」

languages.text: "Marazhai'ın hayatını yaşadığınız sorunu kendiniz çözebilesiniz diye kurtarmadım. Kaldırın silahlarınızı, hepinize söylüyorum!"
languages.original_text: "I did not save Marazhai's life so you could take matters into your own hands! Put your weapons away, all of you!"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai'ın hayatını yaşadığınız sorunu kendiniz çözebilesiniz diye kurtarmadım. Kaldırın silahlarınızı, hepinize söylüyorum!"
